longBusinessSummary: Shyam Metalics and Energy Limited, an integrated metal company, manufactures and sells long steel products and ferro alloys in India and internationally. It produces long steel products, such as iron pellets, sponge iron, steel billets, thermos-mechanically treated bars, structural products, wire rods, and ferro alloys, as well as aluminium and stainless steel products. The company manufactures and sells aluminum foils for use in pharmaceutical, household, contraceptive, FMCG, electronics, electricals, automotive, dairy, confectionery, flexible packaging, and other industries. It sells its products under the SEL brand. In addition, it operates three manufacturing plants, which include captive power plants with an installed capacity of 227MW located in Odisha and West Bengal. The company also exports its products. Shyam Metalics and Energy Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Kolkata, India.
